Title: Creates a computer science course requirement for graduation from high school
Summary: Creates a computer science course requirement for graduation from high school; directs the department of education to design and implement such program.
LawCode: Add ยง817, amd ยง3004, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a computer science graduation requirement; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions of such law relating thereto
